metadata.name: equals2_swf_5
metadata.description: Tests ActionEquals2 opcode (0x49) - Type-aware equality comparison following ECMA-262 specification. Includes number equality, string equality, and number-to-string type coercion. NaN handling added to implementation.
missing_features: Boolean type support not available in recompiler (cannot test true == 1, false == 0)
Null type support not available in recompiler (cannot test null == undefined, null == 0)
Additional edge case testing limited by test framework (NaN, Infinity, empty string tests would benefit from dedicated test files)
Object reference equality not tested (requires object creation support)

completed_features: String equality comparison with null safety
untested_ecma262_features: null/undefined compared with other types should return false
Comprehensive NaN edge cases (requires separate test file)
Empty string to zero conversion (requires separate test file)
